FTUXScreen.title: Welcome
FTUXScreen.instructions: This is a tiny app to help you track simple daily goals.

Goal.title: Create New Goal
Goal.saveText: Once you save this goal, you won't be able to edit this text again.
Goal.input: Enter a short and descriptive daily goal.

Daily.title: Today's Goal Progress
Daily.deleteText: Deleting this goal will permanently remove both the goal and its history.
Daily.completeText:
Marking this goal as complete will permanently remove it from this list.

You'll still be able to view and export goal history.
Daily.instructions: Click the red button below create a new daily goal!

Stats.title: Goal History
Stats.instructions: Create a new daily goal to start tracking your progress!
